alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 8:02PM MST until August 31 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 915 PM MST. * At 802 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Florence to near Casa Grande to 11 miles south of Freeman, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Arizona City, La Palma, Big Horn, San Tan Valley, Seville, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, and Bapchule. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 132 and 178. US Highway 60 between mile markers 209 and 214. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 160. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 39 and 44. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 129 and 150. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 180. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 169 and 204. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
